clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Yoga Training on Postural Stability
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Yoga Training on Postural Stability and Investigating the Gender-Related Responses

brief_summary.textblock: Postural stability can be affected by multiple factors. Such as; body mass, inactivity, age and etc. This study was planned with the aim of investigating the effects of Yoga training on postural stability of males and females. Yoga is a treatment model for body flexibility, body awareness, and strength.

detailed_description.textblock: Postural stability can be affected by multiple factors. Such as; body mass, inactivity, age and etc. This study was planned with the aim of investigating the effects of Yoga training on postural stability of males and females. Yoga is a treatment model for body flexibility, body awareness, and strength.

primary_outcome.time_frame: at first minute, at the 2nd day, at the 15th day and at the30th day
primary_outcome.description: Postural stability score is a composite score including the ability of standing upright position without swing. Individuals stands on a flat platform and perform stepping with possible least changes on their location.

intervention.intervention_name: yoga treatment; flexibility, balance and strength exercises.
intervention.description: yoga treatment including flexibility exercises, balance exercises, and strength exercises.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Sedentary males and females
- want to participate
Exclusion Criteria:
- have any disorders such as; neurologic, orthopedic, psychiatric or/and systemic.
